entities.name: exams
entities.description: Exams are mentioned as something that is coming.

entities.name: n.e.w.t.s
entities.description: N.E.W.T.s are mentioned as exams that the students are not fussed about.

entities.name: snackboxes
entities.description: Snackboxes are ready to roll and are being used by Fred and his friends.

entities.name: murtlap essence
entities.description: Murtlap essence is mentioned as a remedy for boils.

entities.name: lee
entities.description: Lee is mentioned as someone who put Fred and his friends onto the murtlap essence.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as someone who yawned widely and looked out at the cloudy night sky.

entities.name: zacharias smith
entities.description: Zacharias Smith is mentioned as a Quidditch player who might beat Fred's team.

entities.name: quidditch
entities.description: Quidditch is mentioned as a sport that creates bad feeling and tension between the Houses.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who is bent over her Rune translation.

relationships.description: Fred and Zacharias Smith are opponents in the Quidditch match.
Hermione is critical of Quidditch for creating bad feeling and tension between the Houses.
